mapper.select: SELECT a.username, a.password, a.first_name, a.last_name, a.email, a.url, a.profile, r.role FROM account a INNER JOIN role r ON a.username = r.username WHERE a.username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO account ( username, password, first_name, last_name, email, url, profile ) VALUES ( #{username}, #{password}, #{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{email}, #{url}, #{profile} )
mapper.select: SELECT username, body, extension FROM account_image WHERE username = #{username}
